Name: Harem Girl: Isabella
About the game: Harem Girl: Isabella is a puzzle game, in which all you need to do is swap tiles and complete the illustration. Featuring a new Harem Girl; Isabella A relaxing puzzle game to have fun with. Features: A selection of puzzle art to enjoy. Multiple difficulty settings to make the puzzles more complex as you play Swap Tiles to complete the puzzles in several amazing artworks. One handed gaming for easier play ! Random mode which includes Rotating & Flipping of tiles.
